title: Rengar Or Jayce
body: Which should i get to learn , i don't want which is stronger i just want opinions on which i should give a shot at learning if it means anything i main Mid

replies.body: rengar is just more fun to play, jayce is just a suckup scrub champ who does nothing but use e and q
Jayce is more effective then Rengar in mid lane but if you were willing to go jg then Rengar is your man.
If you want to burst down your enemies then go {{champion:107}} if you want to play a champ who's a ranged/melee fighter go {{champion:126}}
